page.title: 07A Pupil at Gayton School
page.content: "I like Gayton school because it is small and when you get stuck on your work the teacher has more time to explain. We are very lucky because we have an outdoor swimming pool and when it is warm enough we swim three times a week. We have two classrooms and we do P.E. in the middle of the main room. We do most of our work in the big room. The big ones work at one end and the rest work at the other. When the other teacher comes in we use the little room. Our secretary works in the big room too. The playgroup uses the school house in the morning and they come into our school to do P.E. and have stories with us. We eat our packed lunch there as well because we don't have proper school meals. The infants go home at 3 o'clock and the juniors go half an hour later".
